page.title: 15The Proposed Motorway
page.content: A motorway is going to be built in 1988. It will cut right through the centre of Hollinwood. It is called the M66 extension, the Manchester Outer Ring Road. Ten miles long, mainly hidden in a cutting, it will stretch from Denton, through Daisy Nook, Hollinwood and Chadderton to the M62 at Heaton Park. It will cost Â£l56 million to build and will take over three years to construct. We carried out a survey of people's attitudes at the local market. Most people thought the Motorway was not necessary, saying it would be no use to them, but some people think it is. Most people knew about the motorway. Nobody said that they were going to move house. A lot of people think it will divide our local community. Some 400 houses will have to be demolished.
